definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)

sentences.english: Hydrogen is the lightest element in nature.
sentences.chinese: 氫是自然界中最輕元素。

sentences.english: This instrument can be used for gas analysis and determine of isotopic abundance of light elements.
sentences.chinese: 此儀器可用於氣體分析以及輕元素的同位素丰度測定。

sentences.english: The correction programs for light elements quantitative electron-probe microanalysis have been performed.
sentences.chinese: 完成了輕元素定量電子探針分析的修正程序。
